welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Millis, a charming town known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We hope you enjoy exploring our quaint streets and experiencing all that Millis has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Central Airport, mainly serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport handles all commercial flights and features modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Worcester Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: InterLink
terminals.description: The InterLink is a transportation hub that connects the airport to the MBTA commuter rail and other forms of transportation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
